data.title: One of the best pizzas in LA
data.text: Fantastic pizza, ingredients are fresh and well balanced. Make sure to order the fresh knots (garlic rolls)as an appetizer and end your meal with the sweet knots(basically rolled cinnamon with glaze on top) they are delicious!!

owner_response.author: Debbie G, Owner at Fresh Brothers, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Dear Andrew -- Thank you so much for sharing your feedback! So glad you had such a great experience! Aren't the sweet knots incredible? Please send me your email address so I can send you a little something as a thank you. All my best--Debbie@FreshBrothers.com
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Next level freshness!
data.text: The name of their restaurant is just! We had a salad, a kids cheese pizza, and a deep dish supreme. I can't explain how delicious the crust was..it was crunchy yet soft, perfect. The sauce was a great flavor and consistency. Cheese tasted premium. The freshness of the vegetables both in the pizza and the salad tasted as if it had just been pulled out of a garden in the back. They were crisp and very flavorful. Between the two of us (me and my 16 yr. old) that ate the medium pizza there were no leftovers (and we usually can't finish all of our food). Staff was friendly and accommodating. This would be my first stop if, no, WHEN, I go back to Santa Monica, even if it's just for this pizza.

owner_response.author: Debbie G, Owner at Fresh Brothers, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Dear losdelgad05 -- Thank you so much for sharing your feedback! So glad you had such a great experience! Please send me your email address so I can send you a little something as a thank you. All my best -- Debbie@FreshBrothers.com
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Recommended Pizza falls flat
data.text: The hotel said this was the best local pizza delivery  but it was mediocre at best. The pizza was similar to frozen Elios pizza. It's not bad just not great. I should have known it wouldn't be good when we asked for a cannoli and they said they don't serve any cannolis.

owner_response.author: Debbie G, Owner at Fresh Brothers, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Dear lizd3, Thank you for sharing your feedback! I'm so sorry your experience was well below our standards. I'd like to send you a gift certificate as an apology with the hope that you'll give us another shot in the near future, on us. Please send me your email address to Debbie@FreshBrothers.com. Thank you.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good Pizza
data.text: Being from Chicago and traveling in California I thought we could not find a pizza similar to home. But what a great surprise when we found Fresh Brothers. The pizza and salads where delicious. They do a great job.

owner_response.author: Debbie G, Owner at Fresh Brothers, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Dear Michael -- thank you so much for sharing your feedback! I'm so glad you found us. We hope to see you the next time you're in CA!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Delicious Food & Friendly Atmosphere
data.text: Lots of delicious options on the menu. I feasted on the barbecue chopped chicken salad, delicious thin crust sausage pizza, and cinnamon knots. My friend had bbq chicken pizza and the Mediterranean chopped salad. Portions are generous, ingredients fresh, and service outstanding. It's no wonder this business is growing by leaps and bounds. Enjoy!

owner_response.author: Debbie G, Owner at Fresh Brothers, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Dear Robyn -- Thank you so much for sharing your feedback! So glad you had such a great experience! Please send me your email address so I can send you a little something as a thank you. All my best -- Debbie@FreshBrothers.com
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great pizza too well hidden!
data.text:
First of all, the food and service here deserve more than 3 stars, but the more than 30 minutes it took to find the place cost them one. The street address is on Lincoln Blvd, but at the right number all you see is a financial services building. AROUND THE CORNER, 3 doors down, is the pizza place, and it has only a little round sign, about 14 inches in diameter. If I hadn't seen an employee wearing his Fresh Brothers shirt in the alley, I never would have found the place. 

That employee, and the guy at the counter were great. The guy in the alley walked beside my car to show me the well hidden entrance to the underground parking and then waited by the elevator in the lobby for me to show me where the restaurant was.

Counter guy was also extremely helpful. I wanted a GF pizza to both eat there and take the rest with me, and a salad to take. No problem, got my excellent and hot pizza brought to the table, then picked up my chilled salad at the counter when I was ready to leave.

The gluten-free pizza crust is the second best I've ever had in more than a dozen years of being on a (medical) gluten-free diet. The sauce could use a few more herbs as it was a bit bland, but the toppings were first rate. 

JUST PUT A DECENT SIZED SIGN, GUYS!

data.title: Only the best!
data.text: Excellent Pizza! This past month I have trying three pizza delivery joints in Santa Monica. Fresh Brothers has been the best by far I enjoyed the "Miller Pizza" is all meat and cheese. Even I couldn't resist (I'm mostly Vegan)Thin crust delight. Delivered on time and hot. Don't waste your pizza dollars anywhere else this is the real deal brother!

data.title: Nice Change
data.text: Different! A nice low fat pizza for a change rather than a “cardiac threat.” Very tasty; prepared with due care to present a tantalizing offering. We’ll try the sliders next.

data.title: GlutenFree Pizza!
data.text: Amazing Pizza! ofcourse you get regular too, but the gluten free is so Good!And on the weekends the Beer is 2 for the price of 1. And yes, you get Gluten Free Beer too!

data.title: Fresh Pizza, Salads and Wings
data.text: Very good pizza and wings but sometimes I just want a salad.  This little place is a nice place to get an individual pizza plus salad or wings, which is nice.  Come in for a quick meal.

data.title: Very nice pizza in Santa Monica
data.text: Fresh Bros is always solid and the Santa Monica version does a nice job.  You can get either thin or deep dish and they even offfer gluten free options, so that is a significant plus.  The salad was good and the service was solid.  Would certainly recommend for a family or a group looking for a fun cheap meal.

data.title: senza infamia e senza lode
data.text: Abbiamo fatto un pranzo fugace e veloce prima di andare verso l'aereoporto. Avevamo chiesto un servizio rapido e veloce. Così è stato. Qualitativamente non è male anche se sicuramente c'è di meglio
